Text: Thanks KINGDOMET. I saw that you had the Blade Trilogy but in other web. I downloaded the trilogy, but BLADE II it´s a corrupt file. There are missing frames on the entire file. Can you reupload it and check it please? Those are hard to find. Part 1 and 3 extended are ok. Only part II it´s corrupted.
The trilogy are from the remastered bluray American BD.
